summary: Expands on the size and variety of Falkreath\'s gravesite by adding new tombstones (models and textures) and more tombstones in general.
descriptionHtml:
==================
[color=#20b2aa]Description:[/color]
==================

Expands on the size and variety of Falkreath\'s gravesite by adding new tombstones (models and textures) and more tombstones in general.


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Updates:[/color]
==================

Version 1.0 - Inital Release


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Installation:[/color]
==================

Use NMM, Wrye Bash, or drag and drop the The Graves of Falkreath.esp and The Graves of Falkreath.bsa files into your Skyrim\'s data folder.


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Un-Installation:[/color]
==================

Uncheck the esp file in the mod manager of your choosing (Skyrim\'s default manager, NMM, Wrye Bash, etc.) and delete the esp file and the bsa file from your computer.


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Incompatible:[/color]
==================

May be incompatible with some other mods that change Falkreath\'s exterior appearance in the two cells I modified.


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Known Issues:[/color]
==================

No known issues.


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Changelog:[/color]
==================

11/24/2012 - Initial Release


==================
[color=#20b2aa]Contact Details:[/color]
==================

If you run into any bugs (I can\'t fathom how there would be any) or have any suggestions/comments, then either PM me here or leave them in the comments section.


==================
[color=#20b2aa]My Other Mods:[/color]
==================

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25528][img]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/25528-2-1350249669ac1s.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28131][img]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/SnowboundAcres.jpg[/img][/url]
author: dj2005
